home.title: Quiz Platform
home.subtitle: Welcome to the Quiz Management System
home.description: Manage your quizzes, companies, and track progress all in one place. Get started by exploring our features below.
home.browseUsersDesc: View and manage all platform users

about.title: About Quiz Platform
about.subtitle: A comprehensive quiz management system for companies and teams
about.description1: Quiz Platform is a modern web application designed to help companies create, manage, and track quizzes for their teams. Built with cutting-edge technologies, it provides a seamless experience for both administrators and users.
about.description2: Whether you're conducting employee training, knowledge assessments, or team building activities, Quiz Platform offers all the tools you need to create engaging and effective quizzes.
about.modernStackDesc: Built with React, TypeScript, Material UI, and Vite
about.fastDesc: Optimized performance with Docker and Nginx
about.comprehensiveDesc: Quiz management, analytics, and real-time notifications
